About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: JEMSO DRIVE - JOY IN MOTION!
About.intro: JEMSO is a movement with several directions, all related to automobiles. Today, the brand includes:

metadata.title: About Us
metadata.description: Learn about JEMSO DRIVE - automotive community organizing festivals, races, drift and drag racing championships since 2020.

events.title: JEMSO EVENTS
events.description: A company organizing automotive festivals, races, drift and drag racing championships, car shows, and road trips.

motorsport.title: JEMSO MOTORSPORT
motorsport.description: A service for tuning and maintaining vehicles, including race cars.

club.title: JEMSO DRIVE CLUB
club.description: An automotive community available by subscription for everyone, as well as a Closed Automotive Club with its own structure - membership is only possible through personal approval by the club's founder.
club.cities: The club currently has permanent offices in 3 cities: Makhachkala, Derbent, Khasavyurt.

media.title: JEMSO MEDIA
media.description: A YouTube channel and other media platforms dedicated to automotive topics.

history.title: Historical Background
history.intro: JEMSO is an abbreviation that stands for:

2020.title: The Beginning
2020.p1: We started as a club gathering in the directions mentioned above on the streets of Makhachkala. Our underground meetings quickly gained popularity due to the cozy atmosphere and mutual respect.
2020.p2: From the very first meetings, we managed to create an environment for productive communication - at our second event, the first car exchange deal between participants took place. We just enjoy hanging out with our iron horses and we're open to mutually beneficial offers.
2020.quote: As JEMSO founder Shamil MS Khaibulaev says: "JEMSO is the emotion you feel being at the center of an automotive gathering"
2020.p3: That same year, due to the overwhelming number of people wanting to participate, we came out of the shadows and started organizing official events and making our first collaborations.

2021.title: AutoGodekan
2021.p1: We held AutoGodekan - our largest festival that we organize once every 4 years. We awarded prizes and gifts to the best representatives of each direction according to the jury, followed by a demonstration performance by Dagestani drifters.
2021.note: The first AutoGodekan was organized by our founder together with Mansory Club back in 2017, when JEMSO didn't even exist yet.

2022.title: Legalization
2022.p1: We held our first large legal gathering in the city center. It was the season opening, and we dedicated it to the memory of Zaur Ibragimov and Said Gubdensky.
2022.p2: Then we organized another event - a joint meetup of Mercedes Club W124 and BMW E34. By the way, at this event we held Gymkhana-style races for the first time.
2022.p3: After that, Shamil traveled across Russia, helping organize numerous automotive events throughout the country, both exhibitions and sports events, to learn from the best.

2023.title: Expansion
2023.p1: 2023 was the most productive year in terms of exhibitions. We held 5 exhibitions that year:
2023.list1: 2 exhibitions were held in winter in a hangar in Tokyo style
2023.list2: 2 more were timed to the release of the beloved Fast & Furious 10
2023.list3: A vintage car exhibition in Derbent - for the first time outside Makhachkala
2023.p2: And finally, in October of the same year, we held the first official races in Dagestan in 12 years.

2024.title: Breakthrough
2024.apr_sep_text: The first-ever Dagestan Drag Racing Championship!
2024.sep_text: A week before the final stage of the races - we break our own (and therefore regional) record for the scale of an exhibition in the city center.
2024.oct_text: We bring official drift back to Dagestan.

Club.clubDescriptionEnd: with its own structure - membership is only possible through personal approval by the club's founder.
Club.chaptersIntro: Club chapters currently operate in 3 cities on a permanent basis:
Club.eventRegistrationText: To participate in our upcoming events, please contact us through social media or email. Registration details and requirements will be provided for each specific event.
Club.exclusiveEventsDesc: Access to members-only meetups and competitions

Drag.title: Drag Racing

metadata.title: Drag Racing
metadata.description: First ever Dagestan Drag Racing Championship 2024 by JEMSO. Pure speed, pure adrenaline. Classes: STREET, PRO, SUV, UNLIMITED.

Drag.championship2024Text: In the 2024 season, we held the first-ever open Dagestan Drag Racing Championship. The championship took place in three stages. Over 100 racers participated in our championship across various car classes.
Drag.suvDesc: Crossovers and SUVs in their own category
Drag.historicText: Our drag racing competitions marked the return of official racing to Dagestan after 12 years. We are proud to continue this tradition and provide a safe, legal platform for speed enthusiasts.

Drift.title: Drift

metadata.title: Drift
metadata.description: JEMSO DRIVE organizes professional drift competitions and shows across Dagestan. We brought official drift back to Dagestan in October 2024.

Drift.aboutText: JEMSO DRIVE organizes professional drift competitions and shows across Dagestan. We bring together the best drivers and provide a platform for both experienced drifters and newcomers to showcase their skills.
Drift.october2024Text: We brought official drift back to Dagestan after years of absence. Our championship attracted drivers from across the region and set a new standard for motorsport events in the area.
Drift.joinText: Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, JEMSO DRIVE welcomes all skill levels. Follow our news section for information about upcoming events and registration.
